JobFullDesc:
Our team in CAPCO specializes in management consulting and software development, mostly for international banks and insurance companies in western Europe. We focus on the western market, which allows our employees the opportunity to work overseas, as well as from Bratislava.Benefits of working for CAPCO:• The possibility to travel across Western Europe, but also outside of Europe• The opportunity to work with experienced colleagues in prestige banks• The possibility to learn and build a career at your own pace• The opportunity to work on different projects, no routine• Fully paid sick leave, private health care, hard & soft skills training, and many other benefits
Wage: from 1200 EUR + (regarding previous experience salary can be modified)
 
ROLE DESCRIPTION
This is a superb opportunity for a hardworking, enthusiastic, Junior candidate with a fluent level of English eager to learn more around HR processes. Join our exciting team in Capco.
• Onboarding activities for new joiners in the UK• Daily communication and close cooperation with colleagues in the UK, as well as new joiners• Requesting & collecting all kind of supporting documents needed for successful onboarding (incl. validations)• Covering the onboarding process from an administrative perspective, including cooperation with external agencies to support successful background check• L&D Support, administration of induction as well as milestone and administration• Employee data management (HR database) and processing of employee’s relevant documents• Close cooperation with recruitment & HR Department in the UK
 
SKILLS & EXPERTISE
• Fluent English is a must• Previous Recruitment / HR / Coordination experience is strongly appreciated• MS Office skills (MS Excel, Outlook)• Able to prioritize tasks accordingly• Time flexibility• Strong ability to work within an international environment and be focused on providing a high quality of service to the client• Attention to detail (data quality)
 
Why Join Capco?
We offer:• Technical training, professional certifications, as well as training focused on the development of soft skills (if interested)• Private health care, sick days, employee’s vacation – 25 days per year, regardless of the age• Cafeteria provided by the Benefits plus services (50 EUR monthly)• Fully paid meal vouchers, per diems, above prescribed government level• Smartphone and internet with 20 GB of data, laptop• Fresh fruit, relaxing zone, game room – (table football, PS4), new offices in Nivy Tower
Have we made you curious? Then apply now! It takes only 5 minutes. 
If you have any other question related to the position please reach out to me: Tomas.Vanco@capco.com or https://www.linkedin.com/in/tomasvanco/
